<body>
    <div id="root"></div>
    <script type="text/babel">
        // Hide the Babel development warning in the console
        const originalInfo = console.info;
        console.info = (...args) => {
            if (typeof args[0] === 'string' && args[0].includes('You are using the in-browser Babel transformer')) {
                return;
            }
            originalInfo.apply(console, args);
        };

        const { useState, useEffect } = React;

        const PhoneMockup = ({ conversation, view }) => {
            return (
                <div className="phone-mockup" aria-hidden="true">
                    <div className="phone-notch"></div>
                    <div className="phone-screen">
                        <div className="chat-container">
                            <header className="chat-header">
                                <i className="fa-solid fa-arrow-left"></i>
                                <div className="chat-header-user">
                                    <div className="chat-avatar">
                                        <i className="fa-solid fa-user-circle"></i>
                                    </div>
                                    <span className="chat-username">alex_codes</span>
                                </div>
                                <div className="chat-header-actions">
                                    <i className="fa-solid fa-phone"></i>
                                    <i className="fa-solid fa-video"></i>
                                </div>
                            </header>
                            <div className="chat-body">
                                {conversation.map(msg => (
                                    <div key={msg.id} className={`chat-message ${msg.sender === 'me' ? 'sent' : 'received'}`}>
                                        <p>{msg.text}</p>
                                    </div>
                                ))}
                                {conversation.length === 1 && view === 'login' && (
                                    <div className="chat-actions">
                                        <button className="chat-action-btn">Sign Up</button>
                                        <button className="chat-action-btn">Forgot Password</button>
                                    </div>
                                )}
                            </div>
                            <footer className="chat-input-area">
                                <div className="chat-input-wrapper">
                                    <i className="fa-regular fa-face-smile"></i>
                                    <input type="text" placeholder="Message..." readOnly />
                                    <i className="fa-solid fa-microphone"></i>
                                    <i className="fa-regular fa-image"></i>
                                </div>
                            </footer>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
            );
        };


        const LoginForm = ({ onSwitchToSignUp, onSwitchToForgotPassword, onAtSymbolTyped, email, onEmailChange, password, onPasswordChange, onPasswordFocus, onLogin, isLoggingIn }) => {
            const handleInputChange = (e) => {
                onEmailChange(e.target.value);
                if (e.target.value.includes('@')) {
                    onAtSymbolTyped();
                }
            };
            
            return (
                <div className="login-form" role="form" aria-labelledby="login-title">
                    <h1 id="login-title" className="login-form__title">Login</h1>
                    <form onSubmit={onLogin}>
                        <div className="input-group">
                            <i className="fa-solid fa-at input-group__icon" aria-hidden="true"></i>
                            <input 
                                type="text" 
                                className="input-group__input" 
                                placeholder="Username or Email" 
                                aria-label="Username or Email"
                                autoComplete="username"
                                value={email}
                                onChange={handleInputChange}
                            />
                        </div>
                        <div className="input-group">
                            <i className="fa-solid fa-lock input-group__icon" aria-hidden="true"></i>
                            <input 
                                type="password" 
                                className="input-group__input" 
                                placeholder="Password" 
                                aria-label="Password"
                                autoComplete="current-password"
                                value={password}
                                onChange={(e) => onPasswordChange(e.target.value)}
                                onFocus={onPasswordFocus}
                            />
                        </div>
                        <div className="login-form__buttons">
                            <button type="submit" className="btn" disabled={isLoggingIn}>
                                {isLoggingIn ? 'Logging in...' : 'Login'}
                            </button>
                            <button type="button" className="btn" onClick={onSwitchToSignUp}>Sign Up</button>
                        </div>
                        <div className="login-form__secondary-buttons">
                            <button type="button" className="btn" onClick={onSwitchToForgotPassword}>Forgot Password</button>
                        </div>
                    </form>
                </div>
            );
        };

        const SignUpForm = ({ 
            onSwitchToLogin,
            username, onUsernameChange, onUsernameBlur,
            email, onEmailChange, onEmailBlur,
            password, onPasswordChange,
            confirmPassword, onConfirmPasswordChange,
            onSubmit,
            isSigningUp
        }) => {
            return (
                <div className="login-form" role="form" aria-labelledby="signup-title">
                    <h1 id="signup-title" className="login-form__title">Create Account</h1>
                    <form onSubmit={onSubmit}>
                        <div className="input-group">
                            <i className="fa-solid fa-user input-group__icon" aria-hidden="true"></i>
                            <input 
                                type="text" 
                                className="input-group__input" 
                                placeholder="Username" 
                                aria-label="Username"
                                autoComplete="username"
                                value={username}
                                onChange={(e) => onUsernameChange(e.target.value)}
                                onBlur={onUsernameBlur}
                            />
                        </div>
                        <div className="input-group">
                            <i className="fa-solid fa-at input-group__icon" aria-hidden="true"></i>
                            <input 
                                type="email" 
                                className="input-group__input" 
                                placeholder="Email" 
                                aria-label="Email"
                                autoComplete="email"
                                value={email}
                                onChange={(e) => onEmailChange(e.target.value)}
                                onBlur={onEmailBlur}
                            />
                        </div>
                        <div className="input-group">
                            <i className="fa-solid fa-lock input-group__icon" aria-hidden="true"></i>
                            <input 
                                type="password" 
                                className="input-group__input" 
                                placeholder="Password" 
                                aria-label="New Password"
                                autoComplete="new-password"
                                value={password}
                                onChange={(e) => onPasswordChange(e.target.value)}
                            />
                        </div>
                        <div className="input-group">
                            <i className="fa-solid fa-lock input-group__icon" aria-hidden="true"></i>
                            <input 
                                type="password" 
                                className="input-group__input" 
                                placeholder="Confirm Password" 
                                aria-label="Confirm New Password"
                                autoComplete="new-password"
                                value={confirmPassword}
                                onChange={(e) => onConfirmPasswordChange(e.target.value)}
                            />
                        </div>
                        <div className="login-form__buttons">
                            <button type="submit" className="btn" disabled={isSigningUp}>
                                {isSigningUp ? 'Creating Account...' : 'Sign Up'}
                            </button>
                        </div>
                        <div className="login-form__secondary-buttons">
                            <button type="button" className="btn" onClick={onSwitchToLogin}>Already have an account? Login</button>
                        </div>
                    </form>
                </div>
            );
        };

        const ForgotPasswordForm = ({ onSwitchToLogin, email, onEmailChange, onSubmit, isSendingLink }) => {
            return (
                <div className="login-form" role="form" aria-labelledby="forgot-password-title">
                    <h1 id="forgot-password-title" className="login-form__title">Forgot Password</h1>
                    <p className="login-form__subtitle">Enter your email and we'll send you a reset link.</p>
                    <form onSubmit={onSubmit}>
                        <div className="input-group">
                            <i className="fa-solid fa-at input-group__icon" aria-hidden="true"></i>
                            <input 
                                type="email" 
                                className="input-group__input" 
                                placeholder="Email" 
                                aria-label="Email"
                                autoComplete="email"
                                value={email}
                                onChange={(e) => onEmailChange(e.target.value)}
                            />
                        </div>
                        <div className="login-form__buttons">
                            <button type="submit" className="btn" disabled={isSendingLink}>
                                {isSendingLink ? 'Sending...' : 'Send Reset Link'}
                            </button>
                        </div>
                        <div className="login-form__secondary-buttons">
                            <button type="button" className="btn" onClick={onSwitchToLogin}>Back to Login</button>
                        </div>
                    </form>
                </div>
            );
        };


        const App = () => {
            const [view, setView] = useState('login');
            
            // Login State
            const [email, setEmail] = useState('');
            const [password, setPassword] = useState('');
            const [isLoggingIn, setIsLoggingIn] = useState(false);

            // SignUp State
            const [signUpUsername, setSignUpUsername] = useState('');
            const [signUpEmail, setSignUpEmail] = useState('');
            const [signUpPassword, setSignUpPassword] = useState('');
            const [signUpConfirmPassword, setSignUpConfirmPassword] = useState('');
            const [isSigningUp, setIsSigningUp] = useState(false);

            // Forgot Password State
            const [forgotPasswordEmail, setForgotPasswordEmail] = useState('');
            const [isSendingLink, setIsSendingLink] = useState(false);

            const [conversation, setConversation] = useState([
                { id: 1, text: 'Hey there! üëã Ready to log in or need to create an account?', sender: 'them' }
            ]);

            const addMessage = (text, sender) => {
                setConversation(prev => [...prev, { id: Date.now() + Math.random(), text, sender }]);
            };

            // --- View Switching Logic ---
            const handleSwitchToLogin = () => {
                setConversation([{ id: 1, text: 'Hey there! üëã Ready to log in or need to create an account?', sender: 'them' }]);
                setEmail('');
                setPassword('');
                setView('login');
            };

            const handleSwitchToSignUp = () => {
                setConversation([{ id: 1, text: "Let's create your account! ‚ú® First, choose a cool username.", sender: 'them' }]);
                setSignUpUsername('');
                setSignUpEmail('');
                setSignUpPassword('');
                setSignUpConfirmPassword('');
                setView('signup');
            };
            
            const handleSwitchToForgotPassword = () => {
                setConversation([{ id: 1, text: "No worries! It happens. What's the email address associated with your account? ü§î", sender: 'them' }]);
                setForgotPasswordEmail('');
                setView('forgotPassword');
            }


            // --- Login Logic ---
            const handleAtSymbolTyped = () => {
                const hasFollowUpMessage = conversation.some(msg => msg.id === 2);
                if (!hasFollowUpMessage) {
                    const newMessage = { id: 2, text: "Looks like you've been here before! üòâ", sender: 'them' };
                    setConversation(prev => [...prev, newMessage]);
                }
            };

            const handlePasswordFocus = () => {
                const hasSentEmail = conversation.some(msg => msg.sender === 'me' && msg.text === email);
                if (email.includes('@') && email.includes('.') && !hasSentEmail) {
                    addMessage(email, 'me');
                    setTimeout(() => {
                        addMessage("Got it! ‚úÖ Now, just enter your secret password.", 'them');
                    }, 250);
                }
            };
            
            const handleLogin = async (e) => {
                e.preventDefault();
                if (!password || isLoggingIn) return;

                setIsLoggingIn(true);
                const maskedPassword = '‚Ä¢'.repeat(password.length);
                addMessage(maskedPassword, 'me');

                const simulateApiLogin = (userEmail, userPassword) => {
                    return new Promise(resolve => {
                        setTimeout(() => {
                            if (userEmail === 'test@example.com' && userPassword === 'password123') {
                                resolve({ success: true });
                            } else {
                                resolve({ success: false });
                            }
                        }, 1000);
                    });
                };

                try {
                    const response = await simulateApiLogin(email, password);
                    if (response.success) {
                        addMessage("Awesome, you're in! Welcome back! üöÄ", 'them');
                    } else {
                        addMessage("Hmm, that combo didn't work. ü§î Double-check your email and password and let's give it another shot!", 'them');
                    }
                } catch (error) {
                    addMessage("Uh oh! ü§ñ Our servers are a bit shy right now. Please try again in a moment.", 'them');
                } finally {
                    setIsLoggingIn(false);
                }
            };

            // --- SignUp Logic ---
            const handleUsernameBlur = () => {
                const hasBeenAdded = conversation.some(msg => msg.sender === 'me' && msg.text === signUpUsername);
                if (signUpUsername && !hasBeenAdded) {
                    addMessage(signUpUsername, 'me');
                    setTimeout(() => {
                        addMessage("Great choice! Now, what's your email? (e.g., alex@example.com) üìß", 'them');
                    }, 400);
                }
            };
            
            const handleSignUpEmailBlur = () => {
                const hasBeenAdded = conversation.some(msg => msg.sender === 'me' && msg.text === signUpEmail);
                if (signUpEmail.includes('@') && signUpEmail.includes('.') && !hasBeenAdded) {
                    addMessage(signUpEmail, 'me');
                    setTimeout(() => {
                        addMessage("Got it. Now, create a strong password. It needs to be at least 8 characters long. üîí", 'them');
                    }, 400);
                }
            };
            
            const handleSignUp = async (e) => {
                e.preventDefault();
                if (isSigningUp) return;

                if (!signUpUsername || !signUpEmail || !signUpPassword || !signUpConfirmPassword) {
                    addMessage("Oops! Please fill out all the fields to join us. ‚úçÔ∏è", 'them');
                    return;
                }

                if (signUpPassword !== signUpConfirmPassword) {
                    addMessage("Whoops! Your passwords don't match. Let's try that again. üëØ", 'them');
                    return;
                }

                if (signUpPassword.length < 8) {
                    addMessage("Your password is a bit short! For security, please make it at least 8 characters long. üí™", 'them');
                    return;
                }

                setIsSigningUp(true);
                addMessage('‚Ä¢'.repeat(signUpPassword.length), 'me');

                const simulateApiSignUp = (username, email, password) => {
                    return new Promise(resolve => {
                        setTimeout(() => {
                            resolve({ success: true });
                        }, 1500);
                    });
                };
                
                try {
                    const response = await simulateApiSignUp(signUpUsername, signUpEmail, signUpPassword);
                    if (response.success) {
                        addMessage("You're all set! Welcome aboard! üéâ You can log in now.", 'them');
                        setTimeout(() => {
                            handleSwitchToLogin();
                        }, 2000);
                    } else {
                        addMessage("Oh no, something went sideways. ü§ñ Let's try signing up again in a moment.", 'them');
                    }
                } catch (error) {
                    addMessage("Uh oh! ü§ñ Our servers are a bit shy right now. Please try again in a moment.", 'them');
                } finally {
                    setIsSigningUp(false);
                }
            };

            // --- Forgot Password Logic ---
            const handleForgotPassword = async (e) => {
                e.preventDefault();
                if (isSendingLink) return;

                if (!forgotPasswordEmail) {
                    addMessage("Please enter your email address first. üìß", 'them');
                    return;
                }
                
                if (!forgotPasswordEmail.includes('@') || !forgotPasswordEmail.includes('.')) {
                    addMessage("That email doesn't look quite right. Please check it and try again.", 'them');
                    return;
                }

                setIsSendingLink(true);
                addMessage(forgotPasswordEmail, 'me');

                const simulateApi = () => new Promise(resolve => setTimeout(() => resolve({ success: true }), 1500));

                try {
                    await simulateApi();
                    addMessage("Got it! If an account exists for that email, you'll find a reset link in your inbox. üíå", 'them');
                    setTimeout(() => {
                        handleSwitchToLogin();
                    }, 3000);
                } catch (error) {
                    addMessage("Uh oh! ü§ñ Our servers are a bit shy right now. Please try again in a moment.", 'them');
                } finally {
                    setIsSendingLink(false);
                }
            };


            const renderForm = () => {
                if (view === 'signup') {
                    return <SignUpForm 
                                onSwitchToLogin={handleSwitchToLogin}
                                username={signUpUsername}
                                onUsernameChange={setSignUpUsername}
                                onUsernameBlur={handleUsernameBlur}
                                email={signUpEmail}
                                onEmailChange={setSignUpEmail}
                                onEmailBlur={handleSignUpEmailBlur}
                                password={signUpPassword}
                                onPasswordChange={setSignUpPassword}
                                confirmPassword={signUpConfirmPassword}
                                onConfirmPasswordChange={setSignUpConfirmPassword}
                                onSubmit={handleSignUp}
                                isSigningUp={isSigningUp}
                          />;
                }
                
                if (view === 'forgotPassword') {
                    return <ForgotPasswordForm 
                                onSwitchToLogin={handleSwitchToLogin} 
                                email={forgotPasswordEmail}
                                onEmailChange={setForgotPasswordEmail}
                                onSubmit={handleForgotPassword}
                                isSendingLink={isSendingLink}
                            />;
                }

                return <LoginForm 
                            onSwitchToSignUp={handleSwitchToSignUp} 
                            onSwitchToForgotPassword={handleSwitchToForgotPassword}
                            email={email}
                            onEmailChange={setEmail}
                            password={password}
                            onPasswordChange={setPassword}
                            onAtSymbolTyped={handleAtSymbolTyped} 
                            onPasswordFocus={handlePasswordFocus}
                            onLogin={handleLogin}
                            isLoggingIn={isLoggingIn}
                        />;
            };
            
            return (
                <main className="app-container">
                    <PhoneMockup key={view} conversation={conversation} view={view} />
                    {renderForm()}
                </main>
            )
        };

        const rootEl = document.getElementById('root');
        if (rootEl) {
            const root = ReactDOM.createRoot(rootEl);
            root.render(
                <React.StrictMode>
                    <App />
                </React.StrictMode>
            );
        }
    </script>
</body>
</html>
